channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
ok this may be uncommon to say in help but i would like someone to code and host a server for me. i would like to run a server and i know how but my computer is to slow to host one and it I am not knowledged in java. I am not trying to neccessarily be picky but I dont care how much you know about java i would like someone that is mature and is able to have a decent conversation. i think this is asking for help so i am putting it under this section.
i think i have alot of unique ideas for a server but it needs someone who can help me to allow this to happen. please respond

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @niota niota
item.description:
@niota wrote:

i more or less would like to be an advisor for a server but alot of people dont want people telling them what to do… like i know how to make a server big. atleast i think so

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

If somebody hosts and codes your server, then it really won’t be your server because you won’t have control of the server, and you won’t be doing any work.

Read full topic
